extension.name: YJ Module Engine
extension.author: YouJoomla.com
extension.description:
Youjoomla Module Engine for Joomla 1.6x and UP
Thank you for downloading Youjoomla.com extension.
To setup your module please hover over the module parameters
and follow the instructions.
If you need support please post new thread in our Forum .
Have fun playing with your new extension :).
Youjoomla.com

field.name: module_template
field.label: Select default module template
field.description:
You can create custom layout templates for this module. Simply click the create new template button below and module engine will copy Default template and name it by the name you have selected in creation process.
You could also copy modules/mod_yjme/tmpl/Default folder , rename it to your own template name and edit default.php within your template folder to your liking.
Once you have created your module template , your template name will be visible here.
For template overrides please copy your module template folder to your template/html/mod_yjme/ folder and create custom overides for each module instance. To get you started we have created blank module template name New. Edit Template option can be used to customize the module template files from here.

field.name: module_css
field.label: Select default module CSS
field.description: Assign default module CSS file. You can use Edit, Upload or Create new options to customize the CSS files from here.

field.name: item_source
field.label: Select default news item source
field.description: Please select your default news item source. Note:News item source cannot be combined. Example: K2 only or Joomla Only. You can however make a copy of the module and publish K2 or Joomla news items instance on same page.

field.name: get_items
field.label: Select one or more categories
field.description: In this categorie there must be min 1 news item published

field.name: item
field.label: Select specific items
field.description: Choose specific news items you would like to display. Note that category setting above will not take affect if this option is chosen.

field.name: getspecific
field.label: Specific items list and order
field.description: First select few items from setting above. Drag and drop to re-order items. Click the remove icon to remove an item from the list. Note that the items reorder works only if you set News items ordering to Specific items order!

field.name: ordering
field.label: News Items Ordering
field.description: Choose news items order sequence. Note that Specific items order is the display order of your Specific items order setting above

field.name: show_frontpage
field.label: Show frontpage Items?
field.description: If set to yes module will show your Joomla frontpage news items. Leave this at No to avoid duplicated content

field.name: category_id
field.label: Select one or more categories
field.description: Select one ore more categories for which you want to filter an items list. Select none to fetch items from all categories.

field.name: k2item
field.label: Select specific items
field.description: Choose specific news items you would like to display. Note that category setting above will not take affect if this option is chosen.

field.name: k2items
field.label: Drag and drop to re-order items
field.description: Drag and drop to re-order items. Click the remove icon to remove an item from the list.

field.name: k2image_size
field.label: K2 Image to use
field.description: Choose what K2 image size to show

field.name: k2ordering
field.label: K2 News Items Ordering
field.description: Choose news items order sequence. Note that Specific items order is the display order of your Specific items order setting above

field.name: access_redirect
field.label: Show registered only Items?
field.description: If your news item Accsess level is set to Regsitered and this setting is set to Yes , your restricted items will be visible in module but their read more link will redirect to login page
